snippet: The Food and Drug Administration has approved eight injections to be used to treat the sometimes painful and embarrassing curvature known as Peyronie’s disease.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves first drug to treat Peyronie's disease, which is embarrassing and sometimes painful curvature of penis; drug Xiaflex, made by Auxilium Pharmaceuticals, is administered as treatment consisting of eight injections in penis, spaced six weeks apart.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration has approved eight injections to be used to treat the sometimes painful and embarrassing curvature known as Peyronie’s disease.

headline.main: Injections to Treat an Embarrassing Ailment Win U.S. Approval
headline.print_headline: Injections to Treat an Embarrassing Ailment Win U.S. Approval
